thread.title: Raith Rovers sack manager Gary Locke and assistant Darren Jackson
thread.title_full: Raith Rovers sack manager Gary Locke and assistant Darren Jackson

title: Raith Rovers sack manager Gary Locke and assistant Darren Jackson
text:
Raith Rovers sack manager Gary Locke and assistant Darren Jackson 7 Feb Read more about sharing. Locke and Jackson Raith Rovers have sacked manager Gary Locke and assistant Darren Jackson after a run of 14 games without a win. 
Tuesday's 1-0 home defeat to Morton leaves the Kirkcaldy side eighth in the Championship, four points above the relegation play-off place. 
Locke, 41, took over at Stark's Park last May following Ray MacKinnon's departure to Dundee United. 
The former Hearts manager resigned as Kilmarnock boss in January 2016 after less than a year in the post. Share this page
